metadata.description: VM0 SaaS integration skills for Claude Code

plugins.name: apify
plugins.description: Web scraping and automation platform with pre-built Actors for common tasks

plugins.name: axiom
plugins.description: Axiom observability platform for logs, events, and analytics via REST API

plugins.name: bitrix
plugins.description: Bitrix24 REST API via curl. Use this skill to manage CRM (leads, deals, contacts), tasks, and users.

plugins.name: brave-search
plugins.description: Brave Search API via curl. Use this skill for privacy-focused web, image, video, and news search with no tracking.

plugins.name: bright-data
plugins.description: Bright Data Web Scraper API via curl. Use this skill for scraping social media (Twitter/X, Reddit, YouTube, Instagram, TikTok), account management, and usage monitoring.

plugins.name: browserbase
plugins.description: Cloud browser infrastructure for AI agents. Use this skill to create browser sessions, persist contexts for authentication, debug live sessions, and retrieve session recordings.

plugins.name: browserless
plugins.description: Headless browser as a service for screenshots, PDFs, scraping, and automation

plugins.name: chatwoot
plugins.description: Chatwoot customer support API via curl. Use this skill to manage contacts, conversations, and messages for multi-channel customer support.

plugins.name: cloudinary
plugins.description: Upload images and videos to Cloudinary with CDN delivery and transformations. Use this skill for media hosting, optimization, resizing, format conversion, and video concatenation.

plugins.name: cronlytic
plugins.description: Cronlytic cron job scheduler API via curl. Use this skill to create, manage, pause/resume scheduled HTTP requests and webhook automation.

plugins.name: deepseek
plugins.description: DeepSeek AI large language model API via curl. Use this skill for chat completions, reasoning, and code generation with OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

plugins.name: dev.to
plugins.description: Dev.to API via curl. Use this skill to publish and manage articles on Dev.to.

plugins.name: discord
plugins.description: Discord Bot API via curl. Use this skill to interact with channels, guilds, users, and messages using a bot token.

plugins.name: discord-webhook
plugins.description: Discord Webhook API via curl. Use this skill to send messages, embeds, and files to Discord channels without a bot.

plugins.name: elevenlabs
plugins.description: ElevenLabs AI voice generation API via curl. Use this skill to convert text to speech with realistic AI voices.

plugins.name: fal.ai
plugins.description: fal.ai AI image generation. Use this skill when you need to use fal, fal.ai, or generate images from text prompts using AI text-to-image models.

plugins.name: figma
plugins.description: Figma REST API for accessing design files, comments, components, and projects. Use this skill to read file contents, export images, manage comments, and integrate with Figma workspaces.

plugins.name: firecrawl
plugins.description: Firecrawl web scraping API via curl. Use this skill to scrape webpages, crawl websites, discover URLs, search the web, or extract structured data.

plugins.name: github-automation
plugins.description: Automate GitHub operations using gh CLI - manage repositories, issues, pull requests, releases, and workflows. Use when working with GitHub, managing repos, creating issues/PRs, or when users mention GitHub operations, gh CLI, or repository management.

plugins.name: github-copilot
plugins.description: GitHub Copilot REST API via curl. Use this skill to manage Copilot subscriptions and retrieve usage metrics.

plugins.name: gitlab
plugins.description: GitLab REST API via curl. Use this skill to manage projects, issues, merge requests, and pipelines in GitLab.

plugins.name: gmail
plugins.description: Gmail API via curl. Use this skill to read, send, and manage emails, labels, drafts, and threads.

plugins.name: google-sheets
plugins.description: Google Sheets API via curl. Use this skill to read, write, and manage spreadsheet data programmatically.

plugins.name: hackernews
plugins.description: Hacker News API via curl. Use this skill to fetch top stories, new posts, comments, and user profiles from Hacker News.

plugins.name: htmlcsstoimage
plugins.description: HTMLCSStoImage API via curl. Use this skill to generate images from HTML/CSS or capture screenshots of web pages.

plugins.name: imgur
plugins.description: Upload images to Imgur for free hosting. Use this skill when you need to upload images and get public URLs for sharing or embedding in articles.

plugins.name: instagram
plugins.description: Instagram Graph API integration via curl. Use this skill to fetch and publish Instagram media.

plugins.name: instantly
plugins.description: Instantly.ai API via curl. Use this skill for cold email outreach automation, managing campaigns, leads, and email accounts.

plugins.name: intercom
plugins.description: Intercom REST API for managing customer conversations, contacts, messages, and support tickets. Use this skill to send messages, manage contacts, handle conversations, and access help center content.

plugins.name: jira
plugins.description: Jira Cloud REST API via curl. Use this skill to create, update, search, and manage issues, projects, and workflows in Jira.

plugins.name: kommo
plugins.description: Kommo CRM API via curl. Use this skill for managing leads, contacts, companies, tasks, and sales pipelines.

plugins.name: lark
plugins.description: Lark/Feishu API integration for messaging, group management, contacts, and calendar. Use this skill to send messages, manage chats, query contacts, and sync calendar events with Lark/Feishu.

plugins.name: linear
plugins.description: Linear issue tracking API via curl. Use this skill to create, update, and query issues, projects, and teams using GraphQL.

plugins.name: mercury
plugins.description: Mercury Banking API via curl. Use this skill to manage bank accounts, transactions, transfers, and financial operations.

plugins.name: minimax
plugins.description: MiniMax API via curl. Use this skill for Chinese LLM chat, text-to-speech, and AI video generation.

plugins.name: minio
plugins.description: MinIO S3-compatible object storage API. Use this skill for file upload, download, bucket management, and pre-signed URL generation.

plugins.name: monday
plugins.description: Monday.com GraphQL API via curl. Use this skill to manage boards, items, and projects.

plugins.name: notion
plugins.description: Notion API for managing pages, databases, and blocks. Use this skill to create pages, query databases, search content, and build integrations with Notion workspaces.

plugins.name: openai
plugins.description: OpenAI API via curl. Use this skill for GPT chat completions, DALL-E image generation, Whisper audio transcription, embeddings, and text-to-speech.

plugins.name: pdf4me
plugins.description: Comprehensive PDF processing API for conversion, merge, split, compress, OCR, and more

plugins.name: pdfco
plugins.description: PDF processing API for conversion, extraction, merging, splitting and more

plugins.name: pdforge
plugins.description: PDForge (PDF Noodle) API for generating PDFs from templates or HTML via curl.

plugins.name: perplexity
plugins.description: AI-powered search engine with real-time web grounding and citations

plugins.name: plausible
plugins.description: Plausible Analytics API for querying website statistics and managing sites. Use this skill to get visitor counts, pageviews, traffic sources, and manage analytics sites.

plugins.name: podchaser
plugins.description: Podchaser GraphQL API for podcast data, discovery, episodes, creators, and sponsorship information.

plugins.name: pushinator
plugins.description: Pushinator push notification API via curl. Use this skill to send push notifications to mobile devices.

plugins.name: qdrant
plugins.description: Qdrant vector database REST API via curl. Use this skill to store, search, and manage vector embeddings.

plugins.name: qiita
plugins.description: Qiita API integration for searching, reading, and publishing technical articles. Use this skill to search articles, get user posts, publish content, and manage comments on Qiita.

plugins.name: reportei
plugins.description: Reportei marketing report generation API via curl. Use this skill to manage clients, reports, templates, integrations and webhooks for automated marketing analytics.

plugins.name: resend
plugins.description: Resend email API via curl. Use this skill to send transactional emails, manage contacts, domains, and API keys.

plugins.name: rss-fetch
plugins.description: Fetch RSS/Atom feeds via curl. Use this skill to gather news and articles from RSS sources.

plugins.name: runway
plugins.description: Runway AI API for video generation via curl. Use this skill to generate videos from images, text, or other videos.

plugins.name: scrapeninja
plugins.description: High-performance web scraping API with Chrome TLS fingerprint and JS rendering

plugins.name: sentry
plugins.description: Sentry API via curl. Use this skill to manage error tracking, list issues, resolve errors, and monitor releases in Sentry.

plugins.name: serpapi
plugins.description: SerpApi search engine results API via curl. Use this skill to scrape Google, Bing, YouTube, and other search engines.

plugins.name: shortio
plugins.description: Short.io URL shortener API via curl. Use this skill to create, manage, and track short links on custom branded domains.

plugins.name: slack
plugins.description: Slack API for sending messages, reading channels, and managing conversations. Use this skill to post messages, upload files, and interact with Slack workspaces.

plugins.name: slack-webhook
plugins.description: Send messages to Slack using Incoming Webhooks. Simple one-way messaging to a specific channel without OAuth setup.

plugins.name: streak
plugins.description: Gmail-integrated CRM for managing pipelines, deals (boxes), contacts, and email threads

plugins.name: supabase
plugins.description: Supabase REST API via curl. Use this skill for database CRUD operations, filtering, pagination, and real-time data management.

plugins.name: supadata
plugins.description: Supadata API via curl. Use this skill to extract transcripts from YouTube/TikTok/Instagram videos and scrape web content to markdown.

plugins.name: tavily
plugins.description: Tavily AI search API integration via curl. Use this skill to perform live web search and RAG-style retrieval.

plugins.name: twenty
plugins.description: Open-source CRM API for managing people, companies, notes, tasks and custom objects

plugins.name: VM0
plugins.description: VM0 API for running AI agents in secure sandboxes. Use this skill to execute agents, manage runs, and download outputs (artifacts) and inputs (volumes) via the VM0 platform API.

plugins.name: youtube
plugins.description: YouTube Data API v3 via curl. Use this skill to search videos, get video/channel info, list playlists, and fetch comments.

plugins.name: zapsign
plugins.description: ZapSign electronic signature API via curl. Use this skill to create documents for signature, manage signers, and track signing status.

plugins.name: zendesk
plugins.description: Zendesk Support REST API for managing tickets, users, organizations, and support operations. Use this skill to create tickets, manage users, search, and automate customer support workflows.

plugins.name: zeptomail
plugins.description: Zoho ZeptoMail transactional email API. Use this skill for sending password resets, OTPs, order confirmations, and other transactional emails.

plugins.name: strava
plugins.description: Strava API v3 via curl. Use this skill to query athlete activities, segments, clubs, gear, and routes on Strava. Use when users mention Strava, running/cycling activities, fitness tracking, or want to retrieve workout data.
